mapper.select: SELECT cb.customer_id, cb.authority_code, cb.name, cb.email, cde.gender, cde.birthday, cde.address FROM customer_basic cb JOIN customer_detail cde ON cb.customer_id = cde.customer_id WHERE cb.customer_id = #{id}

SELECT cb.customer_id, cb.authority_code, cb.name, cb.email, cde.gender, cde.birthday, cde.phone, cde.address FROM customer_basic cb JOIN customer_detail cde ON cb.customer_id = cde.customer_id WHERE cb.email = #{email} AND cb.password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_basic(customer_id, authority_code, password, name, email) VALUES (#{customer_id}, #{authority_code}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email})
INSERT INTO customer_detail(customer_id, birthday, gender, phone, address) VALUES (#{customer_id}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address});
